data.title: GoodHope FM – Cape Town's leading music focused interactive lifestyle radio station
data.text:
The Wake-Up Call is an upbeat, vibe filled early morning show which is bound to help you start your day on the right note. The charisma and energy shared by the host is infectious! Mix that with great music, traffic and whether updates as well as the latest and hottest trending topics and you get the perfect morning riser. That’s not all, you (the listener) get to take control of the playlist with your “Wake and Shake” song request just before 6am. So, start your day on a high with The Wake Up Call every weekday at 05:00 to 06:00am, exclusive to Good Hope FM.

Learn more

The Morning Show is the first ALL Female hosted show on Good Hope FM. TV and Radio stalwart Leigh-Anne Williams leads this team of incredible women, which includes radio veteran and accomplished Newsreader Sandra Rosenberg and 2021 Bright Star Radio Award winner, Delucia Daniels who produces the show. The shows tagline is “Welcome to the best three hours of your life” and that is certainly what the Morning Show aims to give listeners. The show is vibrant and packed with energy. The weekly features include: Travel Tuesday, Money Matters, Wellness Wednesday, Warrior Woman, Movie Tunes and Mind Your Business. Each feature is designed to inspire, empower and equip our audience while entertaining them with the best in mid-morning music.

Learn more

Dr’s In The House hosted by the legendary Dr Jules is the ultimate party starter in Cape Town and is all is about tapping into the commercial club scene and taking the experience home to our listeners. Each night the show plays almost four hours of mixes by some of Cape Town’s finest DJs and guest DJs from around the country, and beyond our borders. The show plays several genres of music, including mixes that range from Commercial Dance Music, House, Electro House, Afro House, Hip Hop, R&B and Old School. The show has a club like feel with listener interaction via WhatsApp messages and on social media platforms, and is fast paced, highly interactive and brings the party to your living room. It allows DJs from all over the city, country and internationally to showcase their skills and gain exposure in the art of curating and mixing music. We play multiple genres of music including Commercial dance, Hip hop, Afro House, Old School and more. I enjoy the hype while providing opportunities for those “undiscovered” talents and established names in the Performing Arts to show what they’re capable of. We certainly bring the heat and have thus nicknamed DITH, “The Lituation”.

Learn more

The TwinzSpin Mashup Show specializes in the freshest, most popular House Music. They break through South Africa's Top Urban House Music for all house heads featuring Amapiano, Afro Tech, Deep House, Afro House & some Gqom. The SA Top 10 House Music countdown is all about the listeners and their votes. The chart is updated to the Good Hope FM Website every Friday evening where they reveal the number 1 song of the week. The Mash Up Mix features and exposes South Africa’s Hottest DJs to represent their city. TwinzSpin use their show as a platform to show appreciation to their fans and listeners by engaging with them on every social platform. Double The Pleasure, Double The Fun #TMS

Learn more

Hosted by the incredible, Danilo Acquisto, you can expect to hear all the biggest songs internationally and nationally. Aside from that, Acquisto gives you sneak previews of future beats that could potentially make it onto the chart and brings you the latest entertainment and music news as well as interviews with your favourite celebs. It is the punchiest show you will ever encounter, so join us every Saturday from 9AM to 12PM, and be a part of the Hit 30 family. We can’t wait to see you in the ring!

Learn more

His inspiration is largely drawn from the ever so popular “Matinee” club experience of the late 90s. The journey on a Saturday will have you singing along to your favorite past and present hits. If you happened to find yourself on a dance floor that Garth B was in charge of, I suggest you tune in every Saturday from 12pm till 3pm

Learn more

From 12pm till 3pm expect to be taken on a nostalgic trip stemming back to the 80s, 90s and 00’s. Be prepared to sing along to each and every song while prepping and enjoying Sunday lunch with friends and family. The memories of these songs will create on air topics of conversation that you might have been a part of.

Learn more
